pageTitle: Minolta Filter Experience.: Sony Alpha SLR/SLT A-mount Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Is it the lens or is it the filter? I suspect something in the lens. Regards, Renato Puzzled, I eventually took the lens off and cleaned the inside of the lens - which had quite a film on it. There wasn't any film on the outside. The lens then worked fine. I've since cleaned a number of filters on Minolta and other old lenses, and a few seemed to have a fine film inside rather than outside - though none as bad as with that 200mm lens. I took shots and was getting weird results. Some time back, I bought a
